titleStmt.title: A brief discovery of the corruption of the ministrie of the Church of England, or, Three clear and evident grounds from which it will apear that they are no ministers of Christ published for the information of all by Thomas Colyer.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.

titleStmt.title: A brief discovery of the corruption of the ministrie of the Church of England, or, Three clear and evident grounds from which it will apear that they are no ministers of Christ published for the information of all by Thomas Colyer.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
(from t.p.) I. A parrallel between them and the Jewish priests -- II. A parrallel between them and Simon the Sorcerer -- III. A parrallel between them and the artificiall marchandizing tradesmen.
